sentence: The plant is outside Turner’s Dayton-based congressional district, instead belonging to Republican Jim Jordan‘s district.
title: Lawmakers' answer to the Russia-Ukraine crisis: Weapons made in their states

sentence: Microsoft has been previously accused by its competitors, as well as lawmakers including Republican Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan, who chairs the House Judiciary Committee overseeing antitrust legislation, of influencing members of Congress to target Meta, Google, Apple and Amazon while exempting itself.
author: BPR Wire
title: Google accuses Microsoft of ‘carving out’ exception in anti-Big Tech bill targeting app stores

sentence: If it’s constitutional, that’s what his job should be — it’s him.” Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), who was seated next to McCarthy at the event, agreed with the minority leader, saying, “Totally.” While Wyden remains the only lawmaker to call on Thomas to recuse himself, several legal experts have made similar comments.
author: Callie Patteson
title: Clarence Thomas called to recuse himself over wife’s alleged texts
